sentences.chinese: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

name: fair
trans: He sold me his car for a fair price.

sentences.english: a fair maiden
sentences.chinese: 美丽的少女

detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attractive

name: flow
trans: The water flowed over the rocks and into the lake.

sentences.english: a new road system to improve traffic flow through the city centre
sentences.chinese: 疏导市中心车流的新道路系统

sentences.english: These gates regulate the amount of water flowing into the canal.
sentences.chinese: 这些闸门调节流入运河的水量。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth steady movement of liquid, gas, or electricity
when a liquid, gas, or electricity flows, it moves in a steady continuous stream

name: forward
trans: When he saw his mother, the baby crawled forward to her.

sentences.english: He leaned forward , his elbows resting on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他身体前倾，胳膊肘撑在桌子上。

sentences.english: The crowd surged forwards.
sentences.chinese: 人群向前涌去。

sentences.english: The next scene takes the story forward five years.
sentences.chinese: 下一个场面是描述故事中五年后的情况。

detailed_translations.english: towards a place or position that is in front of you

name: hill
trans: The sun was rising above the green hills.

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

name: level
trans: Please check the level of the temperature.

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object
flat and not sloping in any direction

name: lone
trans: A lone man walked along the street.

sentences.english: A lone figure was standing at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 公交车站上站着一个孤单的身影。

sentences.english: He was by no means a lone voice criticizing the government.
sentences.chinese: 批评政府的绝不止他一个人。

sentences.english: a lone gunman
sentences.chinese: 独行持枪歹徒

sentences.english: the lone survivor of a shipwreck
sentences.chinese: 一次海难的唯一幸存者

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about the only person or thing in a place, or the only person or thing that does something

name: puddle
trans: When the ice melted, it formed a puddle.

sentences.english: Children splashed through the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们噼噼啪啪地踩过一个个小水坑。

detailed_translations.english: a small pool of liquid, especially rainwater

name: response
trans: He asked if I was sad. My response was “No.”

sentences.english: His immediate response was one of disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一反应是不相信。

sentences.english: Carl made no response , and carried on with his meal.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔没有回答，继续吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done as a reaction to something that has happened or been said

name: season
trans: Fall is a warm season, while winter is very cold.

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

name: solution
trans: There are many problems. We need solutions!

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: waste
trans: Turn off the water so you don’t waste it.

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

name: whether
trans: I could not decide whether to go left or right.

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

name: always
trans: They always brush their teeth in the morning.

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

name: ask
trans: Please ask questions if you do not understand.

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.

sentences.english: a piece of bread and butter

sentences.english: We had cake and ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了蛋糕和冰激凌。

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

trans: I put a carrot in my salad.

sentences.english: grated carrots

sentences.english: carrot juice

name: chicken

sentences.english: Lionel built a coop so that they could raise chickens and have a supply of fresh eggs.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂内尔搭建了一个鸡笼，这样他们就可以养鸡，得到新鲜鸡蛋。

sentences.english: roast chicken
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡

detailed_translations.english: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs

name: chocolate
trans: I made a chocolate cake for my mom’s party.

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

trans: I have to find something to contain these apples.

sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

trans: I loved the delicious fried chicken I ate for dinner!

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass

detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

sentences.chinese: 她的饮食不是很健康。

sentences.english: It is important to have a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 饮食均衡很重要。

sentences.chinese: 大米是主食。

detailed_translations.english: the kind of food that a person or animal eats each day

sentences.chinese: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.english: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.chinese: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.chinese: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.chinese: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.chinese: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.english: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.chinese: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.english: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.chinese: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.english: Does Rob eat fish?
sentences.chinese: 罗布吃鱼吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it

name: food
trans: Pasta is a famous food in Italy.

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: fruit
trans: Apples, pears, and oranges are types of fruit.

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜

sentences.english: a glass of fruit juice
sentences.chinese: 一杯果汁

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: great
trans: It was a great, exciting game!

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

name: health
trans: People who want good health should not smoke.

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

name: recipe
trans: Do you use a recipe when you make that sauce?

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

name: restaurant
trans: Let’s eat at the Indian restaurant.

sentences.english: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

name: special
trans: The cupcake was special because it had blue frosting.

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.english: No one receives special treatment.
sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.english: Maria’s special recipe for apple pie
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.english: Each village has its own special charm.
sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

name: alive
trans: My grandparents are still alive even though they are over 90.

sentences.english: It was a bad accident – they’re lucky to be alive.
sentences.chinese: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.english: My grandparents are still alive .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母和外祖父母都还健在。

sentences.english: We stayed alive by eating berries.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃浆果活命。

sentences.chinese: 他靠生命维持装置活着。

sentences.english: Apparently he’s alive and well and living in Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 看来他还健在，住在巴西。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活着的；活泼的；有生气的

sentences.chinese: X光检查显示有两处骨折。

sentences.english: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure.
sentences.chinese: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

sentences.english: Danny, don’t bother Ellen while she’s reading.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼，埃伦看书的时候不要去打扰她 。

sentences.chinese: 你似乎让自己遇上了点麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: to annoy, worry or upset sb
trouble or difficulty

sentences.english: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
sentences.chinese: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

sentences.chinese: 他于1991年率队夺得胜利。

detailed_translations.english: the sailor in charge of a ship, or the pilot in charge of an aircraft
If you captain a team or a ship, you are the captain of it

name: conclusion
trans: At the conclusion of the race, the spectators cheered for the winner.

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

name: explore
trans: He wants to explore the world and see new things.

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

name: glad
trans: I am glad you came to my party.

sentences.english: We’re so glad you came.
sentences.chinese: 你来了我们真高兴。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.chinese: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.english: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

detailed_translations.english: pleased and happy about something

name: however
trans: She is a great cook. However, she never had professional lessons.

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

name: injustice
trans: Putting an innocent person in jail is an act of injustice.

sentences.english: The movie deals with injustices suffered by Native Americans.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影讲述印第安人受到的不公正待遇。

sentences.english: He had developed a deep sense of social injustice.
sentences.chinese: 他深深感到社会的不公。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people are treated very unfairly and not given their rights

name: international
trans: The United Nations is a powerful international organization.

sentences.english: the response of the international community
sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.english: the UN and other international organizations
sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving more than one nation

name: lawyer
trans: The lawyer left the courthouse after the judge made her decision.

sentences.english: Prosecution and defence lawyers are expected to deliver closing arguments next week.
sentences.chinese: 原告律师和被告律师下周将要作终结辩论。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to advise people about laws, write formal agreements, or represent people in court

name: mention
trans: The doctors mentioned the problems that the patient was having.

sentences.english: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.chinese: 我的名字被提到过吗？

sentences.english: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.english: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.chinese: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.english: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

sentences.english: They all get a mention (= they are all mentioned ) in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他们在书中全都被提到了。

detailed_translations.english: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details
when someone mentions something or someone in a conversation, piece of writing etc

name: old
trans: My mother is seventy years old now.

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.english: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is old has lived for a very long time

name: policy
trans: He told us that his policy was to put customers first.

sentences.english: US policy towards China
sentences.chinese: 美国的对华政策

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something that has been officially agreed and chosen by a political party, a business, or another organization

name: social
trans: People should come together and fix the world’s social problems.

sentences.english: social issues, such as unemployment and education
sentences.chinese: 失业和教育之类的社会问题

sentences.english: the country’s serious social problems
sentences.chinese: 该国严重的社会问题

sentences.english: a challenge to the social order
sentences.chinese: 对社会秩序的一个挑战

detailed_translations.chinese: 社会的； 交际的， 社交的
detailed_translations.english: relating to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives

name: speech
trans: She gave a speech to the class.

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

name: staff
trans: My dad has a staff of four people to help him at the office.

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: toward
trans: Santa walked toward my house with a bag of gifts.

name: wood
trans: I put the pieces of wood in a pile.

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

name: achieve
trans: I was happy that I could achieve my goal.

sentences.english: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.english: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.english: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.chinese: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard

name: advise
trans: My mother often advises people about their money.

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.english: Keep us advised of (= continue to tell us about ) any new developments.
sentences.chinese: 请随时告诉我们任何新的进展情况。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

name: already
trans: It is already time for the movie to start. Let’s go in.

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.english: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

name: basic
trans: I learned some basic English skills in school today.

sentences.english: the basic principles of chemistry
sentences.chinese: 化学的基本原理

sentences.english: The basic idea is simple.
sentences.chinese: 基本思想很简单。

sentences.english: basic research
sentences.chinese: 基础研究

sentences.english: basic information
sentences.chinese: 基本信息

detailed_translations.english: forming the most important or most necessary part of something

trans: I ate a bit of chocolate before I went to bed.

sentences.english: He’s taken the engine to bits .
sentences.chinese: 他把发动机拆开了。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of something

trans: Pete didn’t like his job. He considered getting a new one.

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

trans: The glass was destroyed.

sentences.english: companies that are polluting and destroying the environment
sentences.chinese: 污染和破坏环境的公司

detailed_translations.english: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be used or repaired

trans: The clown entertained the kids at the party.

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure

trans: The squirrel had extra nuts for the winter.

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

name: goal
trans: Her goal was to become a doctor.

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

name: lie
trans: Whenever Pinocchio lied to his father, his nose grew.

sentences.english: to lie on your back/side/front
sentences.chinese: 仰 / 侧 / 俯卧

sentences.english: The book lay open on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 那本书摊开放在他的书桌上。

sentences.english: The town lies in a small wooded valley.
sentences.chinese: 该城镇坐落于一个林木茂盛的山谷中。

detailed_translations.english: to be or put yourself in a flat or horizontal position so that you are not standing or sitting

name: meat
trans: This piece of meat I’m eating tastes very good.

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: What’s your opinion of Cathy?
sentences.chinese: 你对凯茜的看法如何？

detailed_translations.english: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

name: real
trans: Some people don’t believe in aliens from space, but I think they’re real.

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

name: reflect
trans: Her face was reflected in the smooth glass.

sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

name: regard
trans: The boy regarded the girl as a good friend.

sentences.english: He was regarded as the most successful president of modern times.
sentences.chinese: 他被看成是近代最成功的总统。

detailed_translations.english: to think about someone or something in a particular way

name: serve
trans: He served us our drinks quickly.

sentences.english: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.chinese: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用

the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

name: vegetable
trans: Carrots are my favorite vegetable.

sentences.english: fresh fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 新鲜果蔬

sentences.english: organic methods of growing vegetables
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜的有机种植方法

sentences.english: vegetable soup
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜汤

sentences.english: a neat vegetable garden
sentences.chinese: 整洁的菜园

sentences.english: Vitamin A is found in liver and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 动物肝脏和绿色蔬菜中含有维生素A。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that is eaten raw or cooked, such as a cabbage, a carrot, or peas
relating to plants in general, rather than animals or things that are not living

name: war
trans: Many young men died in the war.

sentences.english: the Vietnam War
sentences.chinese: 越南战争

sentences.english: He served as a pilot during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战时担任飞行员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
detailed_translations.english: when there is fighting between two or more countries or between opposing groups within a country, involving large numbers of soldiers and weapons

name: worth
trans: Our house is worth a lot of money.

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

name: appear
trans: She appeared to be sad. She was crying.

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

trans: The base of the table has three legs.

sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

name: brain
trans: You must use your brain to solve the problem.

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

name: career

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

sentences.english: a clerk in a commercial firm
sentences.chinese: 一家商行的文员

detailed_translations.chinese: 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记账员；<古>牧师，教士
detailed_translations.english: someone who keeps records or accounts in an office

detailed_translations.chinese: 当销售员，当店员；当职员
detailed_translations.english: to work as a clerk

name: effort

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。

sentences.english: Knock before you enter.
sentences.chinese: 进来前先敲门。

sentences.english: The rebels were prepared to enter negotiations (= start discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子愿意参加谈判。

detailed_translations.english: to come or go into sth

sentences.english: an excellent suggestion
sentences.chinese: 极好的建议

sentences.chinese: 他的汽车状况极佳。

sentences.chinese: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good or of very high quality

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

name: hurry

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

name: inform

sentences.english: They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.chinese: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

detailed_translations.english: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it

name: later

sentences.english: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
sentences.chinese: 我出去一会儿——回头见。

detailed_translations.english: after the time you are talking about or after the present time

sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

name: locate
trans: I could not locate my keys in the house.

sentences.english: The business is located right in the center of town.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店就在市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or place

name: nurse
trans: A nurse helped me get better.

sentences.english: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.english: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.english: He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured

name: operation
trans: The operation on my arm was a success.

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: pain
trans: His head was full of pain.

sentences.english: The pain is getting worse.
sentences.chinese: 疼得越来越厉害了。

sentences.english: Greg was in a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 格雷格疼痛万分。

sentences.english: the pleasures and pains of growing old
sentences.chinese: 变老的苦与乐

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when part of your body hurts

name: refuse
trans: The dog refused to play with the cat.

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

name: though
trans: Though he was overweight, he liked to be active.

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

name: various
trans: She owned shoes of various styles.

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

name: actual
trans: This is the actual sword that the king owned, not a fake one.

sentences.english: I’m not joking. Those were his actual words.
sentences.chinese: 我没开玩笑，那都是他的原话。

sentences.english: I know Germany won, but I can’t tell you the actual score.
sentences.chinese: 我知道德国队胜了，但我不知道确切的比分。

sentences.english: Interest is only charged on the actual amount borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 利息只按实际借款额收取。

sentences.english: In actual fact (= really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is real or exact

name: amaze
trans: The news in the paper amazed Jack.

sentences.english: Dave amazed his friends by suddenly getting married.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫突然结婚，令朋友们非常吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: to surprise someone very much

name: charge
trans: The charge for the shirts was $15.

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

name: comfort
trans: I wanted to comfort my friend after I heard the bad news.

sentences.english: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.english: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.english: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.english: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

name: contact
trans: I contacted Sue about my party.

sentences.english: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.english: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

detailed_translations.english: communication with a person, organization, country etc
to write to or telephone someone

name: customer
trans: The customer put a few items in a bag.

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

name: deliver
trans: The man delivered Chinese food to my house.

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

name: earn
trans: He earns his living as a chef in a great restaurant.

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

name: gate
trans: We want to put up a wooden gate around our house.

sentences.english: We went through the gate into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过大门进了果园。

sentences.english: the wrought-iron gates of the palace
sentences.chinese: 宫殿的锻铁大门

detailed_translations.english: the part of a fence or outside wall that you can open and close so that you can enter or leave a place
to provide with a gate or gates

name: include
trans: Does this meal include a soft drink?

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

name: manage
trans: I had to manage the meeting myself.

sentences.english: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

name: mystery
trans: The path on the map was a complete mystery to me.

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: occur
trans: When did the thunderstorm occur?

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.english: to happen

name: opposite
trans: The opposite of black is white.

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

name: plate
trans: I put my plate down so I could put some food on it.

sentences.english: The plates were piled high with rice.
sentences.chinese: 盘子里都堆满了米饭。

sentences.english: a beautiful necklace, plated with 22-carat gold
sentences.chinese: 一条漂亮的22开镀金项链

detailed_translations.english: flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver

name: receive
trans: I received a present on my birthday.

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.english: If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.chinese: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.english: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.chinese: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

detailed_translations.english: to be given something

name: reward
trans: He was given a reward for his excellent performance.

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: set
trans: Please set the dice down on the table.

sentences.english: The set (x, y) has two members.
sentences.chinese: （x, y）这个集里有两个项。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers, shapes etc in mathematics

name: steal
trans: The men tried to steal money from the bank.

sentences.english: Boys broke into a shop and stole £45 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else
to be very cheap

name: thief
trans: A thief broke into our home and took my mother’s jewelry.

sentences.english: Thieves broke into the offices and stole $150,000’s worth of computer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 小偷破门进入办公室，偷走了价值15万美元的电脑设备。

sentences.english: They were nothing but petty thieves (= thieves who steal small things ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们只不过是小毛贼。

detailed_translations.english: someone who steals things from another person or place

name: advance
trans: He advanced across the bridge slowly.

sentences.english: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.english: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.chinese: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.english: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.english: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.chinese: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

detailed_translations.english: before something happens or is expected to happen
to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

name: athlete
trans: Some athletes can play many sports very well.

sentences.english: a professional athlete
sentences.chinese: 一位专业运动员

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

name: average
trans: I’m not rich or poor; I’m average.

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

name: behavior
trans: Their behavior was good this semester. They didn’t cause trouble.

detailed_translations.chinese: 行为， 举止， 表现

name: behind
trans: The little girl was hiding behind a tree.

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.english: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

name: course
trans: I took a P.E. course in school this year.

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

name: lower
trans: The chart shows how his production has lowered over the year.

sentences.english: Temperatures will be lower over the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 周末气温会下降。

sentences.english: She lowered her newspaper and looked around.
sentences.chinese: 她放低报纸往四下看了看。

detailed_translations.english: smaller in number or amount
to let or make sth/sb go down

name: match
trans: The two shoes matched. They looked the same.

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

name: member
trans: Julie is the newest member of our team.

sentences.english: The majority of union members voted in favour of a strike.
sentences.chinese: 大多数工会成员投票赞成罢工。

detailed_translations.english: a person or country that belongs to a group or organization

name: mental
trans: I made a mental picture of the room.

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

name: passenger
trans: One passenger was standing near the subway train.

sentences.english: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

name: personality
trans: John has a bad personality.

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

name: poem
trans: William Shakespeare wrote many poems.

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: pole
trans: The flag was hanging from the flag pole.

sentences.english: a telephone pole
sentences.chinese: 电话线杆

detailed_translations.english: a long stick or post usually made of wood or metal, often set upright in the ground to support something
to push a boat along in the water using a pole

name: remove
trans: I removed the nail from the board.

sentences.english: a cleaner that will remove wine stains
sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.english: The college removed rules that prevented women from enrolling.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。

detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

name: safety
trans: For his own safety, he was placed in a car seat.

sentences.english: You shouldn’t travel alone, for safety’s sake .
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，不要独自一人旅行。

sentences.english: For your own safety , please do not smoke inside the plane.
sentences.chinese: 为了您自身的安全，请不要在飞机上吸烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is safe from danger or harm

name: shoot
trans: The hunter raised his gun to shoot at the target.

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

name: sound
trans: The alarm clock sounded and woke us all up.

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

name: swim
trans: I love to swim in the ocean.

sentences.english: Let’s go swimming this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.english: kids learning to swim the backstroke
sentences.chinese: 学习仰泳的孩子们

sentences.english: She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

detailed_translations.english: to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
a period of time that you spend swimming

name: web
trans: Mom cleaned the spider webs out of the garage.

sentences.english: a web of streets
sentences.chinese: 纵横交错的街道

sentences.english: We were caught in a tangled web of relationships.
sentences.chinese: 我们陷入了错综复杂的人际关系网络。

detailed_translations.english: a complicated pattern of things that are closely connected to each other

name: block
trans: I saw a block of ice on the floor.

sentences.english: a wall made of concrete blocks
sentences.chinese: 由混凝土块砌成的墙

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hard material such as wood or stone with straight sides
to prevent anything moving through a space by being or placing something across it or in it

detailed_translations.chinese: 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的

name: bury
trans: My father was buried in his hometown when he died.

sentences.english: Electric cables are buried beneath the streets.
sentences.chinese: 电缆埋在街道的下面。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone who has died in a  grave

detailed_translations.chinese: (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

name: cheer
trans: The crowd all cheered when the home team won.

sentences.english: Everybody cheered when the firemen arrived.
sentences.chinese: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.english: The audience was shouting and cheering.
sentences.chinese: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

detailed_translations.english: to shout as a way of showing happiness, praise, approval, or support of someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
detailed_translations.english: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement

name: complex
trans: A jigsaw puzzle can be complex because it has so many pieces.

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

name: critic
trans: The wine critic tasted the wine so he could give his opinion.

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

name: direction
trans: Go in this direction for 10 minutes, and you will get to the river.

sentences.english: Which direction did they go in ?
sentences.chinese: 他们朝哪个方向走了？

sentences.english: A very helpful woman gave me directions to the police station.
sentences.chinese: 一个很热心的妇女给我指了去警察局的路。

sentences.english: Be sure you read the directions before using any piece of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 使用任何设备之前一定要先阅读操作指南。

detailed_translations.english: the way something or someone moves, faces, or is aimed

name: event
trans: Finishing high school was a major event in his life.

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

name: exercise
trans: You should exercise every day.

sentences.english: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.english: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

sentences.english: role-play exercises
sentences.chinese: 角色扮演练习

sentences.english: Horses need to be exercised regularly.
sentences.chinese: 马需要有规律的训练。

detailed_translations.english: physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

name: friendship
trans: Michael and Lisa have a very strong friendship with each other.

sentences.english: her close friendship with her aunt
sentences.chinese: 她与姑母的亲密友谊

sentences.english: a lifelong friendship
sentences.chinese: 一生的友谊

sentences.english: The two boys formed a deep and lasting friendship .
sentences.chinese: 这两个男孩子建立了深厚持久的友谊。

sentences.english: I could always rely on Gary for friendship and support.
sentences.chinese: 我总是可以依靠加里的友情和支持。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between friends

name: guide
trans: We followed a guide at the park.

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

name: lack
trans: His only problem is a lack of money.

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

name: perform
trans: He will perform a song for the class.

sentences.english: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

sentences.english: She was fired for not performing the duties outlined in her contract.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有履行合同中规定的职责，她被解雇了。

detailed_translations.english: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

name: pressure
trans: They put pressure on him to change his mind.

sentences.english: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.english: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.chinese: 你绝不能屈从压力。

detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

name: probably
trans: You will probably get a good grade if you study for the test.

sentences.english: It'll probably be OK.
sentences.chinese: 这大概没有问题。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that sth is likely to happen or to be true

name: public
trans: I went to the public park to play with my friends.

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

name: smart
trans: Mary is a smart student.

sentences.english: My eyes were smarting with the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel a sharp stinging pain in a part of your body

name: strike
trans: She struck the other girl in the face.

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

name: support
trans: Everyone at work supports the new plan.

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

name: term
trans: I often use the term “oops” when I make a mistake.

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

name: unite
trans: If we unite, we can finish our project faster.

sentences.english: Our goal is to unite the opposition parties and defeat the President.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是联合各反对党挫败总统。

detailed_translations.english: if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something
if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something

name: associate
trans: Most people associate birthday parties with having fun.

sentences.english: Through science we've got the idea of associating progress with the future.
sentences.chinese: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…联系在一起；使联合，结合；交往	[ə'səuʃiət]
detailed_translations.english: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
someone who is a member etc of something, but who is at a lower level and has fewer rights
someone who you work or do business with

name: environment
trans: Keeping our environment clean is important to our health.

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.english: the government minister for the environment
sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

detailed_translations.english: the air, water, and land on Earth, which is affected by man’s activities

name: factory
trans: We have only one factory in our town.

sentences.english: a car factory
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造厂

sentences.english: factory workers
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

name: feature
trans: The cell phone has many features.

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

name: instance
trans: I have never experienced an instance of hate. Have you?

sentences.english: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

detailed_translations.english: an example of a particular kind of situation

name: involve
trans: The whole family was involved in playing the game.

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.english: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

detailed_translations.english: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

name: medicine
trans: The doctor gave me medicine for my cold.

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

name: mix
trans: The green mix we made in science class spilled onto the table.

sentences.english: Oil and water don’t mix.
sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

detailed_translations.english: if you mix two or more substances or if they mix, they combine to become a single substance, and they cannot be easily separated

name: organize
trans: Make a list to help you organize the things you need.

sentences.english: The course was organized by a training company.
sentences.chinese: 这一课程是由一家培训公司组织的。

sentences.english: Students need to learn how to organize their work.
sentences.chinese: 学生要学会如何安排好自己的学习。

sentences.english: We are learning about how genes are organized.
sentences.chinese: 我们在了解基因是如何排列的。

detailed_translations.english: to make the necessary arrangements so that an activity can happen effectively

name: period
trans: In one period in Europe, there were many knights.

sentences.english: Tomorrow’s weather will be dry with sunny periods.
sentences.chinese: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

sentences.english: a double period of Science
sentences.chinese: 一连两节的自然科学课

sentences.english: Pay attention to punctuation, especially to the correct use of commas and periods.
sentences.chinese: 注意标点，特别是逗号和句号的正确使用方法。

detailed_translations.english: a particular length of time with a beginning and an end

name: populate
trans: Billions of people populate the Earth.

sentences.english: The highlands are populated mainly by peasant farmers.
sentences.chinese: 高原人口主要是农民。

detailed_translations.english: if an area is populated by a particular group of people, they live there

name: produce
trans: This tree produces apples every year.

sentences.english: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.english: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.chinese: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.english: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.chinese: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.english: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a particular result or effect

name: range
trans: I saw a range of cars to choose from.

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

name: recognize
trans: I recognized an old friend from many years ago.

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

name: regular
trans: Our regular lunch time is around noon.

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

name: sign
trans: The sign indicated that today would be a bad day.

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: tip
trans: The tip of his pen was very sharp.

sentences.english: He kissed the tip of her nose.
sentences.chinese: 他吻了一下她的鼻尖。

sentences.english: gardening tips
sentences.chinese: 园艺小窍门

sentences.english: Did you leave a tip ?
sentences.chinese: 你留小费了吗？

sentences.english: His helmet had tipped forward and the boy pushed it back.
sentences.chinese: 头盔向前耷拉下来，男孩把它往后推了推。

detailed_translations.english: the end of something, especially something pointed
to move into a sloping position, so that one end or side is higher than the other, or to make something do this

name: tradition
trans: Marriage is a tradition all over the world.

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

name: trash
trans: Please take out the trash; it smells bad.

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

name: wide
trans: The door was as wide as my arms.

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

name: advice
trans: I don’t know how to study for my exams. Can you give me some advice?

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

name: along
trans: Walk along this tunnel for ten minutes, and you’ll see a door on the left.

sentences.english: We were driving along Follyfoot Road.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

sentences.english: She glanced anxiously along the line of faces.
sentences.chinese: 她焦急地扫视着这一排面孔。

sentences.english: He slid his hand along her arm.
sentences.chinese: 他的手顺着她的臂膀滑下。

sentences.english: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.chinese: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

detailed_translations.english: from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it
going forward

name: attention
trans: His work got the attention of two of his co-workers.

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: attract
trans: The magnet attracted the metal.

sentences.english: I’m not usually attracted to blondes.
sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

name: climb
trans: The girls climbed to the top of the mountain.

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

name: drop
trans: A small amount of water dropped from the bottle.

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

name: final
trans: In the final part of the film, the man and the woman got married.

sentences.english: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.chinese: 最后一集将于今晚播出。
